name: Gold Pride - Leon
effectText: If your LP are lower than your opponent's: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 non-Warrior "Gold Pride" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Gold Pride" monsters. During your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster, using only "Gold Pride" monsters you control. You can only use each effect of "Gold Pride - Leon" once per turn.
